synopsis.text: It was a shocking day when the renowned idol, Kusakabe Yuka, abruptly retired from the entertainment industry, leaving her biggest fan, teenage Hata Kosaku, in utter despair. Kosaku's classmates at Tamo Agriculture School eventually coax him out of his room to attend classes, only to witness an unexpected sight: Yuka, under the alias Kinoshita Ringo, joining their class as a transfer student. Seizing this golden opportunity, Kosaku, along with his friends, sets out to uncover the mystery behind her sudden retirement and transfer to an agricultural school, while attempting to forge a deeper connection with his idol-turned-classmate.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
